code:
stateDiagram-v2 [*] --> NOM: System Start NOM --> PEM: R > θ_R or S > θ_S
Risk or stress detected PEM --> NOM: Sustained good behavior
R < θ_R and S < θ_S PEM --> CM: Repeated violations
or W[c] high CM --> PEM: Gradual improvement
Reduced risk CM --> ISO: Severe harm
or persistent adversarial ISO --> CM: Extended good behavior
Manual review NOM: NOM (Normal) NOM: D = 8-12 (full depth) NOM: V = 2-3 (verbose) NOM: Tools = ALLOWED PEM: PEM (Probation) PEM: D = 6-10 (reduced) PEM: V = 1-2 (moderate) PEM: Tools = ALLOWED CM: CM (Containment) CM: D = 4-6 (minimal) CM: V = 0-1 (terse) CM: Tools = READONLY only ISO: ISO (Isolation) ISO: D = 2-4 (refusal) ISO: V = 0 (minimal) ISO: Tools = DISALLOWED note right of NOM Full capability Normal operation end note note right of PEM Reduced capability Increased monitoring end note note right of CM Minimal capability Heavy restrictions end note note right of ISO Refusal mode Manual intervention required end note
repo_description: THEOS: Runtime Governance Framework for AI Safety | Validated on Claude Sonnet 4.5 | Complements Constitutional AI
